ygData.subject: Re: WAR!!!
ygData.msgSnippet: OOC: Are the shields on the CF down? Cause if they aren t then, Alloran, your Maximal characters cannot fire on the Decepticons till the shields are down, and

OOC: Are the shields on the CF down? Cause if they aren't then, 
Alloran, your Maximal characters cannot fire on the Decepticons till 
the shields are down, and they have past the shielded area. (i think 
this is right, but Yan will be able to tell you for sure)


On 1 Apr 2001, at 22:31, Alloran2@... wrote:

> --part1_6b.1210fc4f.27f93e69_boundary
> Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
> Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
> 
> :::The Protectrons/Torca/Ratchet/Sideswipe/Sky 
> Lynx/Orion/Hun-Grr/Cyclonus/Scourge/Fracas/Wheeljack/Banzai-Tron/Hurricane/Hel
> 
> lbat/Batbreast:::
> 
> ::My Maximals see the battle going on.  They look for Targets::
> ~~~~~
> ::Brainstorm fires 2 photon charges from each gun at Rippersnapper::
> ~~~~~
> ::Chromedome fires 25 rapid laser blasts from each gun at Razorclaw::
> ~~~~~
> ::Hardhead fires 25 crystal shards from each gun at Rampage::
> ~~~~~
> ::Highbrow fires a stream of acid from each gun at Divebomb::
> ~~~~~
> ::Torca switches his dorsal gun to nail gun and fires 25 nails at Sinnertwin::
> ~~~~~
> ::Ratchet fires 2 tusk missles and 15 shots from each blaster at Tantrum::
> ~~~~~
> ::Sideswipe fires 25 shots and 2 missles at Headstrong::
> ~~~~~
> ::Sky Lynx fires 2 missles from each gun at FireBlade::
> ~~~~~
> ::Orion looked to Hun-Grr::
> Orion: Hey there ugly, ya wanna piece of me?
> Hun-grr: No, Hun-grr want whole thing!
> ::They fire at each other::
> ~~~~~
> ::Cyclonus and Scourge arrive at the CF::
> ~~~~~
> ::Cyclonus fires 25 rapid laser blasts at Prowl::
> ~~~~~
> Scourge: Fracas!
> ::Fracas deploys, and Scourge fires 2 missles from Fracas at Grimmler::
> ~~~~~
> ::My Alliance members reach the CF.  Wheeljack reports to Zardus::
> Wheeljack: I have arrived Zardus.  Do you have any orders for me?
> ::The others immeadiately find their target::
> ~~~~~
> ::Banzai-Tron fires 2 missles at Megaton::
> ~~~~~
> ::Hurricane fires 15 lightning bolts at Megaton::
> ~~~~~
> Hellbat: Batbreast, attack!
> ::Batbreast deploys and tries to suck Megaton's mech fluid::
> 
> --part1_6b.1210fc4f.27f93e69_boundary
